ygData.subject: ReplayCharSequence
ygData.msgSnippet: So I ve used Heritrix to download a Web page, and I have the page content as a CharSequence (i.e., ReplayCharSequence). The CharSequence interface in Java says

So I've used Heritrix to download a Web page, and I have
the page content as a CharSequence (i.e., ReplayCharSequence).
The CharSequence interface in Java says that its toString()
method should be a string with the characters in the same
order as in the CharSequence.

I do not think that ReplayCharSequence.toString() is
correctly implemented.  (But I could be wrong.)

Assume "ReplayCharSequence cs" has been defined.  Then
printing out "cs.toString()" gives me (the unexpected)
string,
"org.archive.io.ReplayCharSequenceFactory$ByteReplayCharSequence..."

This is not the characters in "cs" but rather a string
representing "cs", I guess.  Instead, if I print out
"(cs.subSequence(0,cs.length()-1)).toString()" I get the
expected output, namely the characters in "cs".  This is
only because the "subSequence" method returns a 
"java.lang.CharSequence", where toString() is correctly
implemented.

Here is the code I used:
System.out.println("First 100 bytes of page:\n"
                + cs.subSequence(0,99));    // GOOD!
String s = cs.toString();
System.out.println("String version:\n" + s);   // BAD!
s = (cs.subSequence(0,cs.length()-1)).toString();  
System.out.println("Second string version:\n" + s); // GOOD!

D.
